name: IronEdge
description:
IronEdge is an IT services company that gives clients an edge by managing their technology experience. For complex, multi-site clients that value IT, we provide enterprise-class Managed Services, Professional Services and Business Intelligence Services unavailable elsewhere in the marketplace.
From the cloud to the core to the edge, IronEdge delivers a concierge level experience to the IT end user and powerful data driven decision-making tools to the business.
